content: the pattern is seamless top-down and made-to-measure so suitable for many sizes you can choose the length yourself so you can make a top or a dress you also decide the width of the dress yourself and you can add a slit the keyhole cutout can be worn at the back or front the pattern includes a pdf with a step-by-step tutorial with photos and a lookbook-pdf for ideas and details of the yarn needed required skills advanced beginner language english us terms what you need - yarn no specific weight - matching crochet hook for your yarn - stitch markers - measuring tape - scissors needle terms of use - you agree this terms when you download this pattern - this pattern is for your personal use only it s not allowed to share it in any way like copying for someone else or publishing a video tutorial or parts of the pattern - you can sell your finished product but have to credit me as the designer instagram handmade_by_bella mue only use your own photos for selling your product not mine or others - you are not allowed to do a mass production
